main_definition: In simple terms or fundamentally, to emphasize the core aspects of a subject.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To state something in a straightforward and uncomplicated manner.
meanings_and_examples.example: Basically, all you need to do is show up on time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Introducing or summarizing the essential part of an idea, story, argument, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: When explaining a complex theory, it's helpful to begin by basing your explanation on its fundamental principles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To get down to the main point without unnecessary detail or complication.
meanings_and_examples.example: If you want to know how successful the project was, basically, we exceeded our goals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a preface for simpler restatement of something already said or explained in more complicated terms.
meanings_and_examples.example: She had an extensive vocabulary, but sometimes she used big words when basically saying the same thing with simpler language.
